thread.title: Man fatally shoots estranged wife, kills self at relatives' home in Shrewsbury
thread.title_full: Man fatally shoots estranged wife, kills self at relatives' home in Shrewsbury

author: From staff reports
title: Man fatally shoots estranged wife, kills self at relatives' home in Shrewsbury
text:
1 of 3 Christian Gooden 
Police from Shrewsbury and St. Louis County confer near the Shrewsbury home where a double shooting took place on the 7800 block of Cardinal Ridge Court on Monday, Feb. 13, 2017. Photo by Christian Gooden, Christian Gooden 
An officer with the St. Louis County Police crime scene unit carries equipment into the Shrewsbury home where a double shooting took place on the 7800 block of Cardinal Ridge Court on Monday, Feb. 13, 2017. Photo by Christian Gooden, Christian Gooden 
Police cordon off the 7800 block of Cardinal Ridge Court in Shrewsbury after a report of a shooting there Monday, Feb. 13, 2017. Photo by Christian Gooden, Man fatally shoots estranged wife, kills self at relatives' home in Shrewsbury From staff reports ( … ) Christian Gooden 
Police from Shrewsbury and St. Louis County confer near the Shrewsbury home where a double shooting took place on the 7800 block of Cardinal Ridge Court on Monday, Feb. 13, 2017. Photo by Christian Gooden, cgooden@post-dispatch.com Christian Gooden 
An officer with the St. Louis County Police crime scene unit carries equipment into the Shrewsbury home where a double shooting took place on the 7800 block of Cardinal Ridge Court on Monday, Feb. 13, 2017. Photo by Christian Gooden, cgooden@post-dispatch.com Christian Gooden 
Police cordon off the 7800 block of Cardinal Ridge Court in Shrewsbury after a report of a shooting there Monday, Feb. 13, 2017. Photo by Christian Gooden, cgooden@post-dispatch.com 
UPDATED with more details at 10 p.m. 
SHREWSBURY • Police said a man fatally shot his estranged wife and shot himself to death Monday morning at the home of one of her relatives here in the 7800 block of Cardinal Ridge Court. 
Shrewsbury police were called about 6:50 a.m. Christopher Daly, 45, of Webster Groves, was dead at the scene; his wife Kenna Daly, 41, was taken to a hospital, where she later died. They were separated and lived in the St. Louis area. 
St. Louis County Police Officer Benjamin Granda said Christopher Daly did not force his way into the home. 
Other relatives were present when the shooting occurred, including their three children, but nobody else was hurt, Granda said. 
Detectives investigated the shooting as a murder-suicide. 
The neighborhood is just east of South Laclede Station Road. 
Christopher Daly lived in the 200 block of North Bompart Avenue in Webster Groves. Kenna Daly was living with relatives at the home on Cardinal Ridge. Tags
